job_history.work_description: Perform aircraft maintenance, preventative maintenance, repairs, and alterations. Research schedule inspections, and parts on BK117-C2, Bell 206, Bell 407, Bell 430, and Pilatus PC-12. Base mechanic and single mechanic on BK117-C2 at the main receiving facility

Performed aircraft maintenance, aircraft alterations, and aircraft repairs. Gained training on all systems for Embraer Brasilia, Bombardier CRJ-200 series, CRJ-700 series, and CRJ-900 series aircraft. Worked in maintenance teams. Performed line maintenance at the gate
Automotive diagnosis and repair on Mitsubishi and Other brands of new and used cars. Auto computer reprogramming and computer scanning
Automotive diagnosis and repair on Mitsubishi and Other brands of new and used cars

skills.name: Aircraft Maintenance
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in performing aircraft maintenance, preventative maintenance, repairs, and alterations on various aircraft models, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Aviation Technology
skills.explanation: Completed an Associate's degree in Aviation Technology and has hands-on experience working with various aircraft systems, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Automotive Repair
skills.explanation: Has experience in automotive diagnosis and repair on various car brands, including Mitsubishi, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Computer-Aided Diagnosis
skills.explanation: Has experience with auto computer reprogramming and computer scanning, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Worked in maintenance teams, indicating a solid level of proficiency in teamwork and collaboration.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has experience in diagnosing and repairing complex problems in aircraft and automotive systems, showing a solid working proficiency in problem-solving.
